title: The Auction Date
description: Twenty-nine year old and newly divorced Emilia is at an all time low in her life. Her best friend, Nikki, begs her to go to a breast cancer awareness auction with her. Up for auction...hot, sexy men! Emilia didn't plan to bid, but as she studied the auction pamphlet she noticed one man with greenish-brown eyes, black hair, and a smile that said it all...trouble! When he is up for auction, Emilia becomes aggressive and goes after what she wants. After hitting it off on their date, they spend a steamy weekend in the hotel together. Will they be able to let each other go when Sunday afternoon comes around and Emilia has to fly home? Warning: This book contains graphic language, explicit sex, and other subjects not appropriate for YA readers.
author: Anna Karam
